entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
